name: node-red-contrib-controltimer
description: A controllable Node-RED timer node. Start, Stop, Reset, Pause and Continue the timer. Use the timer as a loop or a delay.

scripts.build: rimraf dist && npm run lint && npm run -s build:ts && npm run render-html && npm run copy-icons
scripts.watch: rimraf dist && npm run lint && npm run -s watch:ts && npm run render-html && npm run copy-icons
scripts.lint-ci: npm run format && npm run lint --silent && npm run build:ts --silent
scripts.test-watch: npm run run-docker && watch 'npm run rebuild' src
scripts.rebuild: echo '### Changes detected. Rebuilding... ###' && npm run delete-artifacts && npm run build && npm pack && npm run reinstall && echo '### Build done ###'
scripts.run-docker: docker stop node-red-testing || true && docker rm node-red-testing || true && docker run -d --rm -p 1880:1880 -v ~/.node-red:/data --name node-red-testing nodered/node-red:3.0.2-16
scripts.reinstall: cd ~/.node-red && npm uninstall --save node-red-contrib-controltimer && npm install --save ~/GithubProjects/node-red-contrib-controltimer/node-red-contrib-controltimer-0.2.1.tgz && docker restart node-red-testing
